references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a foundational model for graph neural networks, which is used as a baseline in the current paper's experiments.
This paper introduces Graph Attention Networks (GATs), another important graph neural network architecture, used as a baseline in the current paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Distilling the knowledge in a neural network
references.reason: This paper introduces knowledge distillation (KD), a technique for improving model performance that the authors compare their proposed approach to.

references.paper_title: Rethinking the inception architecture for computer vision
references.reason: This paper introduces label smoothing, a regularization technique which inspired the main contribution of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Predict then propagate: Graph neural networks meet personalized pagerank
references.reason: This paper introduces a graph neural network architecture (APPNP) that is compared against the proposed method in the experimental section.
